title: GE Soldier Pack: Infantry Medic
description: This Soldier pack includes a Medic Soldier Specialist, tailored for efficient infantry support. With a fully automatic top of the line submachine gun, this pack will be sure to inspire any true medic.
longDescription:
This Soldier pack includes a Medic Soldier Specialist, tailored for efficient infantry support. With a fully automatic top of the line submachine gun, this pack will be sure to inspire any true medic.

# Contents
- Infantry Soldier
- Maschinepistole 40
- Pistol C96
- Stielhandgranate 24
- SDKFZ 2 Kettenkrad HK 101
- R75 with Sidecar
- GE Medic Pouch
- 14 day Veteran Membership
- 3 x Maschinepistole 40 Specialist Ribbon Booster
- 3 x Chauffeur Ribbon Booster
- 3 x Physical Training Ribbon Booster
- 3 x Medic Ribbon Booster
- 3 x SMG Assault

# Maschinepistole 40
The MP40 (or Maschinenpistole 40 as it is also known) is a fully-automatic submachine gun used by the German army. It fires a 9mm round giving it a controllable recoil and is a very effective weapon at close to medium ranges.

# Pistol C96
The C96 is the world's first effective semi-automatic handgun. When kept clean and well-oiled it is an effective handgun with a very good effective range.

# Stielhandgranate 24
The standard German hand grenade. Twist the cap, pull the glass bead and throw. An experienced soldier can throw it 35-40 meters.

# SDKFZ 2 Kettenkrad HK 101
The 'Kleines Kettenkraftrad' was originally designed for paratroopers, but is now mainly used by infantry as it turned out to be very useful for reconnaissance patrols and transporting squads through difficult terrain.

# R75 with Sidecar
The R75 is an army motorcycle used for quick transportation of troops or scouting. The motorcycle can be used to get one or two soldiers behind enemy positions for a surprise attack or reconnaissance.

# GE. Medic Pouch
A medic pouch is used by soldiers to carry a small supply of first aid kits intended to help wounded soldiers. The pouch can be resupplied at any medic crate on the battlefield.

# Veteran Membership
Progress faster and earn more Credits and Warfunds!

# Ribbon Boosters
Ribbon Boosters will accelerate the progress on all your soldiers during combat. Veteran members will receive the boost on top of the boost from the membership.
